Replace.Text: Each time you convert a city 9with a Religious unit) for the first time, earn 20 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture per [ICON_Citizen] population of that city. Poland's majority religion becomes the dominant religion in cities that loses a tile to a Polish Culture Bomb. Holy Sites gain standard adjacency bonus from all districts. Relics provide addition +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
